resources.string: Spend %1d Kin in %2s? Your new balance will be %3d Kin.
Oops! For some reason the payment did not go through.
The seller has indicated you have previously made this purchase and that no payment is necessary. No additional payment was made.
The current balance of %1d Kin in the account is insufficient to pay for this request. Please acquire more kin and try again.
The account specified to pay is unknown or is unable to locate or access it\'s private key.
There is something wrong with the payment. (Misconfigured/Unknown Invoice)
There is something wrong with the payment. (Misconfigured Request)
This payment was denied by the processor without a reason.
An app update is required to process this request. Please update your app to the newest version and try again.
Uhoh, the system had trouble processing your payment. Please make sure you have access to the internet and try again.
